Title: Asdo Controls and Helpers for WPF
Description:
AsdoLib help to create WPF TabControl that will be work as Chrome.
AsdoLib is developed with Visual Studio 2010 and Expression Blend 4.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
AsdoLib help to create WPF TabControl that will be work as Chrome.
AsdoLib is developed with Visual Studio 2010 and Expression Blend 4.


The Lib is based on retired project ChromeTabControl. Both libs contain some components that help to create an application that look like the Chrome.


AsdoLib helps to create ListBox with manual sorting of items.


AsdoLib contains follow components:
  • SwipePanel, it is a stack panel that supports swiping. It can use in templates of TabControl and ListBox.
  • DragDropHelper, it is a helper that support drag-n-drop out of a window.
Also, this Lib contains a lot of samples of using those components in styles, templates and code.
